draw.overall_supervision_plan: OIC and RSO will continue to assess risks throughout Mortar Gunnery. There are 16 B1 (IMLC) qualified individuals that will be conducting and overseeing the training. Additionally, all standard training risks will be mitigated and controlled at the Platoon Level. Recommend approval.
